achievements_star.situation: Need to demonstrate modern web development skills to potential employers and learn OAuth implementation
achievements_star.task: Build a production-ready Next.js application with secure authentication and database integration
achievements_star.action: Developed Person Search app using Next.js 15.5, implemented Google OAuth from scratch (no auth libraries), integrated Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL, created protected routes with middleware, and deployed to Vercel with comprehensive security documentation
achievements_star.result: Successfully deployed secure application with 100% authentication coverage. Gained deep understanding of OAuth2 flows, JWT tokens, database schema design, and production security practices. Now confident explaining auth implementation in technical interviews.

achievements_star.situation: Required a professional online presence to showcase skills and projects to recruiters
achievements_star.task: Create a modern, responsive portfolio website with a distinctive design
achievements_star.action: Built custom portfolio from scratch with Next.js 15, implemented dark/light mode theming using next-themes, added smooth scroll animations with Framer Motion, optimized Lighthouse scores to 95+, and deployed to Vercel with custom domain
achievements_star.result: Created a clean, minimalist portfolio. Received positive feedback on design sensibility and code organization. The portfolio demonstrates UI/UX skills and attention to detail.

achievements_star.situation: Growing interest in AI/ML technologies and desire to demonstrate RAG system implementation
achievements_star.task: Implement a production-ready RAG system for portfolio AI assistant with custom vector embeddings
achievements_star.action: Integrated Groq AI with llama-3.1-8b-instant model, set up Upstash Vector database for semantic search with 25 embedded knowledge chunks, structured professional profile using STAR methodology, implemented streaming responses with Vercel AI SDK, added session memory with Redis, and created dual-personality system (professional + GenZ modes)
achievements_star.result: Built functional AI assistant with 75% relevance threshold answering queries in real-time. Demonstrates understanding of RAG architecture, vector embeddings, prompt engineering, and LLM integration. Gained valuable experience with modern AI development practices.

content_chunks.content: Name: Ni√±o Marcos. Title: IT Student & Full Stack Developer. Location: Tuguegarao City, Philippines. Summary: 3rd-year IT student at St. Paul University Philippines actively building production web applications. International robotics competitor (4th/118 teams, STEAM Challenge 2018) with hands-on experience in Next.js, TypeScript, and AI integration. Self-taught modern web stack with 3+ deployed applications and practical experience in OAuth, RAG systems, and database management. Elevator Pitch: I'm Ni√±o - I competed internationally in robotics at 13 and have been passionate about building ever since. I've deployed 3 production applications, integrated AI systems, and taught myself modern web development. I enjoy problem-solving, self-directed learning, and have a genuine passion for technology. I'm looking for a team where I can contribute while learning from experienced developers. Fun Facts: Started programming at 8 years old with Scratch, moved to Python by 10. Represented Philippines internationally at 13 - youngest team member. Built my first web app before taking any formal web dev courses. Actually enjoy debugging - it's like solving puzzles under pressure. Can switch between professional recruiter mode and GenZ slang mode üî•

content_chunks.title: Why Hire Me - Honest Pitch
content_chunks.content: The Difference: I've built production apps - handled deployment issue and learned from others experiences. I am detail-oriented and not afraid to fail because I believe the failure is what makes me improve more, currently have deployed 3 apps, and genuinely enjoy problem-solving. What I Bring: Fast learner, resourceful when stuck, eager to learn from experienced devs. I will do my best to contribute utmost value while soaking up knowledge. Always open to be taught by others. Industries I Love: Developer tools, AI-powered apps, education tech, productivity software - anywhere combining technical depth with user impact.

content_chunks.title: Experience at Personal Projects & Portfolio
content_chunks.content: Company: Personal Projects & Portfolio. Title: Full Stack Developer. Duration: 2023 - Present. Company Context: Self-directed learning and project development. Team Structure: Independent developer with collaboration on open-source projects. Technical Skills Used: Next.js 15, TypeScript, React, Prisma, PostgreSQL, OAuth, Tailwind CSS, Groq AI, Upstash Vector, Vercel. Leadership Examples: Self-directed project planning and execution, Documentation creation for knowledge sharing, Code organization following best practices

content_chunks.title: Person Search App - OAuth & Database
content_chunks.content: OAuth Implementation: Built Person Search app with Google OAuth, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL. Implemented authentication from scratch without libraries to understand OAuth2 flows deeply - learned a lot about it and used Google Authentication, added session management, and studied protecting routes. Deployed on Vercel with middleware for route protection. The hands-on approach taught me more than tutorials ever could.

content_chunks.title: Modern Portfolio Website
content_chunks.content: Portfolio Design: Built custom portfolio with Next.js 15, dark/light mode (next-themes), and Framer Motion animations. Focused on clean, minimalist design - I rebuilt it 3 times until it felt right. Optimized Lighthouse scores to 95+ and deployed on Vercel. Simple but polished.

content_chunks.title: AI-Powered RAG Digital-Twin Portfolio
content_chunks.content: Digital-Twin RAG Portfolio: Integrated Groq AI (llama-3.1-8b-instant) with Upstash Vector for semantic search. Set up 27 knowledge chunks with STAR methodology, implemented streaming responses with Vercel AI SDK, added Redis for session memory. Built dual personality (professional + GenZ modes). It's functional and taught me a lot about vector embeddings, prompt engineering, and RAG architecture.

content_chunks.title: International Robotics Competition - STEAM Challenge 2018
content_chunks.content: International Competition (4th/118 teams): Represented Team Philippines in Shenzhen, China at age 13 - one of the youngest in the competition. Competed in Middle category Virtual Programming robot testing and Physical Programming robot testing using Python in VEX IQ Robotics. Developed algorithm solutions under time pressure, debugged code on the spot, and worked with the team. Placed 4th internationally - a great learning experience that showed me I enjoy coding under pressure. In the end our team was awarded Programming Skills Excellence medal.

content_chunks.title: National Robotics Competition - Robothon 2018
content_chunks.content: National Competition (5th/43 schools + Excellence Award): Represented St. Paul University Philippines in 6th Robothon National Competition. Applied Python programming to robotics challenges, implemented control algorithms, and collaborated under pressure. Earned 5th place and Excellence Award - my first major technical competition.

content_chunks.title: Work Ethic & Motivation
content_chunks.content: My Approach: I'm the kind of person who will read your team's codebase in week one to understand how it works. I work on projects outside school for fun, not obligation - I genuinely enjoy coding and building. Quick learner who went from zero to deployed Next.js apps in weeks. I actually read documentation and ask questions when stuck. What Drives Me: Want to work where code matters - where bugs I fix help real users, features I build get used. Motivated by growth, technical challenges, and learning from people smarter than me. I've built production apps, dealt with auth bugs at 2am, and tasted real development - I want more.

content_chunks.title: Learning & Problem-Solving Style
content_chunks.content: Hands-On Learning: I learn by building real projects. When I wanted to learn OAuth, I built a full auth system by reading documentations and watching proper implementation on YouTube. Same with RAG - building this digital twin taught me vector databases and how to train an AI. I rebuild projects when they don't feel right (portfolio rebuilt 3 times). Documentation Approach: I document everything because it helps me think clearly and helps others. My GitHub repos have detailed READMEs and code comments. I've been that confused developer reading unclear docs. Debugging & Research: I actually enjoy debugging - systematic approach, isolation, reading errors carefully. Official docs first, then GitHub issues, then Stack Overflow. I understand solutions before using them, not just copy-paste. Problem Breakdown: Break complex problems into steps. For RAG system: vector embeddings first, then semantic search, then chat integration. One piece at a time.

content_chunks.title: Collaboration & Work Style
content_chunks.content: Communication: I explain technical concepts in simple terms - helped classmates debug code by breaking down problems. I write clean, well-documented code for future me and teammates. Feedback & Growth: I actively seek code reviews and feedback. When someone suggests improvements, I ask 'why?' to learn their reasoning instead of defending my code. Git Workflow: Clean commits with meaningful messages, proper branching. Learned through messy histories why it matters for collaboration. Open Source Mindset: All projects public on GitHub - transparency over perfection. Bugs and suggestions are learning opportunities. Remote Work: Comfortable with async communication, clear documentation, responsive to messages. I know when to unblock myself and when to ask for help. I thrive in environments that value learning, experimentation, and kind feedback.

content_chunks.title: Technical Interests & Self-Assessment
content_chunks.content: Current Focus: Fascinated by AI/ML in web apps - RAG systems, vector databases, embeddings, prompt engineering. Building this digital twin taught me a lot. Next Learning Goals: Backend architecture (microservices, Redis mastery, database optimization, API design), performance (how apps scale 100‚Üí1M users), and exploring Rust, Go, Docker, CI/CD. Why Full Stack: I love both sides - beautiful UI AND solid backend. Understanding the full picture makes me better at both. Long-term Vision: Build products people actually use and love - not just technically impressive but genuinely helpful to the community. Honest Strengths: I pick up tech fast, read documentation, ask questions when stuck, and genuinely enjoy coding (work on projects for fun). I'm resourceful and persistent. What I'm Learning: Haven't worked on large production codebases with teams yet. Eager to learn real-world workflows, code reviews, and how professional teams handle complexity. I'm technically skilled for a student but know I have tons to learn from experienced developers.

content_chunks.title: Tech Resources & Interests
content_chunks.content: Learning Resources: I follow Microsoft (Azure, TypeScript, web dev), AWS (cloud infrastructure), GitHub (open source learning), and Stack Overflow for practical solutions. Data Analytics Interest: Genuinely interested in data analytics and statistics - crucial for understanding user trends, app performance, and making data-driven decisions. Whether analyzing API response times, user behavior patterns, or A/B tests, I enjoy using data to drive improvements and spot meaningful patterns.
